net.kuujo.vertigo.rpc

Class DefaultPollingExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.kuujo.vertigo.component.ComponentBase<T>
      • net.kuujo.vertigo.rpc.AbstractExecutor<PollingExecutor>
        • net.kuujo.vertigo.rpc.DefaultPollingExecutor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component<PollingExecutor>, Executor<PollingExecutor>, PollingExecutor

    public class DefaultPollingExecutor
extends AbstractExecutor<PollingExecutor>
implements PollingExecutor
    A default polling executor implementation.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

      • setExecuteDelay

        public PollingExecutor setExecuteDelay(long delay)
        Description copied from interface: PollingExecutor
        Sets the execute delay. The execute delay indicates the interval at which the executor will attempt to poll the execute handler for new data.
        Specified by:
        setExecuteDelay in interface PollingExecutor
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The called executor instance.

        Specified by:
        getExecuteDelay in interface PollingExecutor
        Returns:
        The empty executor delay.

      • executeHandler

        public PollingExecutor executeHandler(org.vertx.java.core.Handler<PollingExecutor> handler)
        Description copied from interface: PollingExecutor
        Sets an execute handler. The execute handler will be periodically polled for new data. Each time the execute handler is polled only a single message should be emitted. This allows the executor to maintain control over the flow of data. If the execute handler is called but fails to emit any new messages to the network, the executor will reschedule the next call to the handler for a period in the near future.
        Specified by:
        executeHandler in interface PollingExecutor
        Parameters:
        handler - A handler to be invoked for executing the network.
        Returns:
        The called executor instance.
